menusections.description: Have you tried our burgers? It starts with a special blend of beef, quickly pressed flat into a searing hot grill before the fat can escape. Maximising surface area with the grill, the beef cooks quickly with a heavy brown crust (just like a good steak) that keeps the juices in and is packed with flavour.
You don't have to go to Italy on vacation to try Italian pizza. Now Italy can come to you! We cook original recipes using ingredients that we order at the source from reliable suppliers.
Gourmet dessert plate raspberry cheesecake mousse indulgence

menu.name: Beef burger
menu.description: The cosmopolitan cocktail, typically referred to as the 'cosmo', gained popularity during the 1990s when it was frequently mentioned on the television show Sex and the City. The combination of vodka, orange liqueur, lime juice, and cranberry juice have made it a timeless classic.

menu.name: Raspberry cheesecake
menu.description: Gourmet dessert plate raspberry cheesecake mousse indulgence

menu.name: Homemade brownie with icecream
menu.description: Indulgent homemade brownie with chocolate icing and pecans
